      • loadEPtoRSfromFile

        public static void loadEPtoRSfromFile(java.lang.String file)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Load endpoint to results map from a file containing endpoint urls and corresponding results. This is good for big datasets where on-the-fly total results calculation need a lot of time.
        Parameters:
        file - File containing resultset sizes of endpoints
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        file - File containing filter information. note: strict formating required
